attributes.title: worst app ever 🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕
attributes.review: i went to the store awhile after downloading the app and when i came back my dog was gone . after erasing the app my dog magically appeared. WORST app EVER.

attributes.title: It is not good
attributes.review: When I opened it it asked for my personal information I don’t wanna share. Look I’m not for the gen z stuff but this app is dog doo.

attributes.title: Nicole
attributes.review: When I started using the app I felt like I was betraying my people. The app it’s really boring and I really don’t want to support a ignorant man like trump.

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app was terrible. It crash multiple times and broke my phone.

attributes.title: I need a new phone
attributes.review: It didn’t protect me from a virus now my phone has a connection virus, seriously

attributes.title: Not safe
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a naked Donald trump kidnapping a penguin. Like yikes not safe for kids. I also got a threat from a few pedophiles who have infiltrated the app...1 Star
This is bad really bad .  I thought the app would do tremendous job at letting us know what our president is about.  I would give this app a F-.

attributes.title: Chris
attributes.review: Can’t even describe how bad this app is but if any one is trying to download is app please don’t waste your precious time.

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app is terrible just like trump is!! Shame on y’all who actually like it he’s nothing but a bigoted racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexual assaulting orange idiot. Anyways Stan one direction for clear skin.🙈

attributes.title: This app supports white supremacy
attributes.review: The App Store should not allow apps that encourage hatred and bigotry. This app should be removed from the store immediately.
